title: Start
body:
Use Arrow Key or WASD to move
You can change the keyboard layout in the setting if you want
Aim with your cursor
Left click to shoot
-
As you can see, the power is really big
So shoot carefully, because you might get pushed into something dangerous
Now move forward into the next step
As you can see there is a Laser Wall in front and some Enemy Units
Be careful with that Laser Wall, because it can do quite a lot of damage
To turn off the Laser Wall you must destroy all enemy units first
Great job, now move forward into the Energy Container
This is something you have to take care of, so don't shoot this
To secure it you have to be right on top of the Energy Container
impressive, looks like you're ready for the real mission
good luck on your next mission!
